transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hanji sir good morning. Namaskar Kavita Rawat baat kar rahi hu India Mart se. Bataiye sir kya samasya aa rahi hai?
Customer: Main ye keh raha hu ki wo jo ek second option hota hai na lead ka second mobile mein.
Executive: Matlab dusre mobile mein India Mart install karna hai?
Customer: Ji ji do do do number diya hu na main dono mein chahiye hota hai. Ek log Banaras hai ek log Allahabad hai.
Executive: Accha meri baat suniye aap do number diye hai na par aapka jo India Mart hai theek hai use login karne ka jo number hai aapka hi hai theek hai aap aapke agar bhai ya aapka koi employee India Mart ka app install karna chahta hai wo kar sakta hai waha pe jab wo number mangega na to waha par aapko apne jo bhi install kar raha hai na use aapka number dalna hai aapke number pe OTP aayega then India Mart chalega unke number se nahi chalega aapke number se chalega. Ye primary number aapka hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uske baad wo call wall apne number se laga sakte hai koi problem nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai to uske liye main apna number dalu na main.
Executive: Haan uske liye aapko apna login nahi ho pa raha hoga na isiliye nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji iske baad login ho jayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur koi samasya aa rahi hai sir? Aur ye wooden double bed ki aap buylead consume kar rahe hai interior wood work ki buylead consume kar rahe hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Matlab kaafi sari ads ki categories hai jinki aap buylead consume kar rahe hai par ye categories aapke product mein add nahi hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Double bed ki to in sab mein deal karte hai kya?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To ye sab add karna hai abhi?
Customer: Mam jab interior designing ke liye nahi mil rahi hai to fir kya kare aadmi jo paisa diya India Mart ko kya kare bataiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ek second interior designing ki buyleads nahi aa rahi hai isiliye aap in sab product ki buylead consume kar rahe ho aur abhi isme deal karna chahte ho aap ye bol rahe hai.
Customer: Ji interior designing ki laiye mam.
Executive: To abhi wood double bed aur in sab ki chahiye aapko buyleads customers ke required hai ki nahi hai sir?
Customer: Hai hai.
Executive: Uske bhi customer chahiye aapko.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second. Dekhiye aapki mail id pe maine mail bheja hai Kavita ke naam se mail receive hua aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Ek second main dobara check karti hu. Pehle ye second mobile mein main isko matlab kaise kiya jaye?
Executive: Main wo aapko karwa deti hu aap ek bar meeting join kar lijiye to main aapko guide kar dungi.
Customer: Join karu?
Executive: Haan join now ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Join by phone aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan chaliye mobile se join kariye na. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki.

Executive: Hello.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to use IndiaMART on a second mobile.

- Not receiving buyleads for interior designing.



Resolution:

- Explained login process for multiple devices.

- Executive offered to guide via meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will guide customer via meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, multiple devices, buyleads, interior design
